<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

An analysis pass which caches information about the entire <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a>.

Records a cache of the &#39;active&#39; gc strategy objects for the current <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a>.

Definition at line 167 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/gcmetadata-h">GCMetadata.h</a>.
